thread.section_title: Manchester United’s Wayne Rooney ready to seal transfer to China this summer – Metro
thread.title: Manchester United’s Wayne Rooney ready to seal transfer to China this summer
thread.title_full: Manchester United’s Wayne Rooney ready to seal transfer to China this summer

author: markbrus88
title: Manchester United’s Wayne Rooney ready to seal transfer to China this summer
text:
Wayne Rooney has agreed to move to China (Picture: Getty) Wayne Rooney is reportedly ready to quit Manchester United and seal a big-money transfer to the Chinese Super League this summer.
Rumour Mill: our round-up of football gossip, rumours and speculation The 31-year-old has 18 months left on his deal at Old Trafford but has decided to leave after breaking Bobby Charlton’s scoring record last week.
With his place in the club’s history now assured, Rooney is eager to move on to ensure he can go back to playing regular first team football.
According to the Sun, Rooney has a lack of offers from MLS sides, which has persuaded him to become the latest big name to move to China.
More: Football Lindelof, Manolas and five signings Man Utd should still try to save their season 
The England international also stands to earn an incredible £1million per week in the Far East, in what he will feel is a deserved final pay day after a great career at the top level.
United have been linked several times recently with a move to sign Antoine Griezmann as Rodney’s replacement.
MORE: Manchester United star Paul Pogba gets some advice from Wigan boss Warren Joyce
